projects.name: TradeX
projects.description: Beginner-friendly trading platform for Indian stock market using Dhan API and PPO AI model to generate signals for trader education.

images.caption: TradeX branding and logo design representing the trading platform identity.
Splash screen introducing users to the TradeX platform with engaging visuals.
Secure authentication interface for user login and account access management.
User profile dashboard displaying personal information and account details.
Real-time price action table showing stock data and market analysis insights.
Comprehensive settings panel for customizing user preferences and platform configuration.
Referral code generation feature enabling users to invite friends and earn rewards.
Subscription plans interface with user activity tracking and plan management options.

projects.name: Babuji Chaay
projects.description: Full-stack POS and inventory management system for cafés and tea stalls with real client deployment.

images.caption: Babuji Chaay brand identity and logo representing the café management system.
Secure login interface for staff and admin access to the POS system.
Advanced admin authentication interface with multi-level security protocols.
Main dashboard providing real-time sales metrics, inventory status, and business analytics.
Interactive menu page allowing quick browsing and ordering of café items.
Professional invoice generation and printing system for customer transactions.
Public-facing website showcasing the café brand and its offerings online.
Franchise information page displaying expansion opportunities and partnership details.

projects.name: Qure
projects.description: Smart OPD queue management platform enabling remote queue participation without requiring smartphone literacy.

images.caption: Qure branding and logo representing innovative queue management solutions.
Multi-language selection interface making the platform accessible to diverse users.
Role selection screen distinguishing between patients, medical professionals, and admin users.
Patient registration form with simplified interface for easy queue enrollment and management.
Medical professional registration and authentication for healthcare provider access.
